The biological threat has not ended: Just when it seemed that the threat had been destroyed, a new terror that will lead to new chills on the players. Chris Redfield, the hero of the first installment, has followed the path of evil throughout the world. After joining a new organization goes to Africa where the latest bioterrorism threat is transforming people and animals of the city angry and blinded by creatures of violence. It has a new partner, Sheva Alomar, who will bring her strength, intelligence and marksmanship to the mission. To survive, she and Chris will work together and overcome the challenges of discovering the truth behind this evil plot. Through a revolutionary and innovative cooperative mode, players can take control of both characters and experience Resident Evil in different ways. The players fear the daylight as much as did the previous night deliveries, making this chapter the most terrifying experience that fans of the saga have been living ever.
